review.title: “Placement year in 2011. Amazing company to work for with an incredible family atmosphere”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly staff"Doors always open" managementFocus on internal progress rather then external hiringBrilliant set of benefits including pension, bonuses and private health care for perminant rolesExcellent holiday entitlement and they also offer 3 days paid charity leave
review.cons: Cons – Company is growing quickly and the small company mindset can sometimes hamper deals
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Review the management structure more, the company had a danger of outgrowing the internal systems
